revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aceex |model=NP22 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/02/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=IFA-NPXX |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=wireless |default_ssid_regex=^wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:05:B4 |oui_eth=00:05:B4 |default_ch= }} [http://www.aceex.com.tw/L3NP22.html Product page]
"G495-NPXXY-01" is silkscreened on the board.
Per [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=57396 this DD-WRT forums thread], the device has 4MB RAM (Macronix MX29LV320DBTC) and 32MB RAM.
{{TechInfoDepot|Aceex_NR22}} (FCC pictures mirrored)
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID is stated to be '''wireless''' w/ the shown MAC having a 00:05:B4 OUI. It checks out via WiGLE.
